tool_description: An API showing all the articles news around the world related to Coronavirus
name: Coronavirus Latest News
title: Coronavirus Latest News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source Coronavirus
api_list.description: Gets News about Coronavirus Change from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com/api/news/nyt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com/api/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Coronavirus Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Coronavirus Change from all over the world.
